name: Another Rocket Game
description: Action packed 2D rocket game with a campaign story mode, single player mode (vs computer AI) and multiplayer mode (split-screen vs friends). Challenge your self and your friends in an old-school 2D rocket adventure with a great soundtrack and an online highscore leaderboard.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP Processor: Dual Core 2 GHz Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Intel HD Graphics DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 300 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: Core I5 2 GHz Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Newer Nvidia or ATI graphics card
